articles.title: Here's a list of articles explaining the coronavirus pandemic - CNN
articles.description: We've published a number of stories aimed at explaining the impact of the outbreak on all of us -- and what you can do about it. You can find many of these pieces here. We're regularly updating many of them to ensure you have the latest information.
articles.content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.

articles.title: How You Can Help the Homeless During the Coronavirus Pandemic - Newsweek
articles.description: The majority of homeless people live in States such as California, New York, Florida and Texas but increases in rough sleeping and those needing emergency shelter are increasing nationwide.
articles.content:
As America battles against the coronavirus 2019 disease (COVID-19), organizations are concerned about how the pandemic will affect homeless people in the country.

articles.title: Grocery stores in Winnipeg create shopping hours for people susceptible to COVID-19 - Global News
articles.description: Some grocery stores in Winnipeg are offering specific hours for people susceptible to the novel coronavirus disease, COVID-19.
articles.content:
In an effort to reduce the spread of COVID-19, the disease caused by the novel coronavirus, grocery stores in Winnipeg are teaming up to offer dedicated shopping hours for the city’s most vulnerable.

articles.title: Free online learning tools to use for kids during COVID-19 closures - KOAA 5
articles.description: With so many school closings related to the Coronavirus, we're sharing some free, virtual resources that will keep your little ones learning.

articles.title: Covid-19: How long does the coronavirus last on surfaces? - BBC News
articles.description: We can pick up the Covid-19 by touching surfaces contaminated with the new coronavirus, but it is only just becoming clear how long the virus can survive outside the human body.
articles.content: Neeltje van Doremalen, a virologist at the US National Institutes of Health (NIH), and her colleagues at the Rocky Mountain Laboratories in Hamilton, Montana, have done some of the first tests of how long SARS-CoV-2 can last for on different surfaces. Their s… [+2466 chars]

articles.description: Some salons have announced new cleaning and hygiene procedures. Whether these will be enough to prevent the spread of coronavirus remains to be seen.

articles.description: The new coronavirus (Covid-19) is spreading fast.
